history.content:
On October 8th, the Academic Progress Report (APR) tool will be available on 'My Academics' in Cal Central. The intention of this tool is to track your progress on completing all degree requirements.
Please be on the look out for a message from the L&S Office of Undergraduate Advising regarding the use of this tool for confirming University, Campus and College level requirements.
With regard to requirements for the major, we have been in the process of validating this tool for accuracy. At this time, we encourage you to use the APR to review your progress in the major, but please be aware that there may be some errors. You can report any errors to cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu.
history.subject: Academic Progress Report Tracking Tool for LSCS
